name: Get The Gems (itch)
description:
Get The Gems is an action-puzzler in the oldschool-style of Boulder Dash and Emerald Mine

You are Fluffy, a poor little slimeball.
You are trapped in an abandoned mine deep below the earth's surface.
Dig through caves and collect shiny gems.
Dodge falling boulders and avoid sneaky enemies.
Encounter a strange bubbling mass and explode nitro bubbles.

Find your way back to the surface!

Happy spelunking!
